message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. I've set the price at $14,000, reflecting its value and potential. What are your thoughts?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $12,000 for it. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Bob, I understand your position, but I can't let go of this product for less than $13,000. It's a very fair price considering its value. What do you think?
I see that you're firm on your price, Alice. I would like to continue the discussion and propose a price of $12,500 for the product. I believe this is a fair compromise between our positions.
